stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Be a part of the leading event for SRE enthusiasts, taking place in London on September 14th-15th, with over +50 talks. Secure your early bird tickets now and guarantee your spot!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Be a part of the leading event for SRE enthusiasts, taking place in London on September 14th-15th, with over +50 talks. Secure your early bird tickets now and guarantee your spot! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: IBM's latest creation
stories.Description: Their analog AI chip, featuring 64 AIMC cores, is designed to mimic the human brain. This prototype promises efficient computations for deep neural networks.
stories.Tweet: IBM's latest creation 📦 Their analog AI chip, featuring 64 AIMC cores, is designed to mimic the human brain. This prototype promises efficient computations for deep neural networks. #IBM https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/ibm-unveils-an-analog-ai-chip-that-works-like-a-human-brain

stories.Title: Meet your new pilot: Pibot
stories.Description: A humanoid robot, developed at the Korea Advanced Institute of Science & Technology, has the ability to fly an aircraft just like a human pilot with the help of natural language.
stories.Tweet: Meet your new pilot: Pibot 📦 A humanoid robot, developed at the Korea Advanced Institute of Science & Technology, has the ability to fly an aircraft just like a human pilot with the help of natural language. #robotics https://www.euronews.com/next/2023/08/15/meet-pibot-the-humanoid-robot-that-can-safely-pilot-an-airplane-better-than-a-human

stories.Title: In search of polar clues
stories.Description: Rocket Lab's mission with NASA aims to understand polar energy emissions. Tiny satellites will be launched to track far-infrared energy at the poles, enabling fresh insights into climate change.
stories.Tweet: In search of polar clues 📦 Rocket Lab's mission with NASA aims to understand polar energy emissions. Tiny satellites will be launched to track far-infrared energy at the poles, enabling fresh insights into climate change.  #NASA https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/14/rocket-lab-to-launch-a-pair-of-climate-satellites-for-nasa/

stories.Title: Intuitive Machines gear up for the moon
stories.Description: With a key role in NASA's CLPS program, Intuitive Machines aims high with IM-1's lunar lander mission. Set to launch on a Falcon 9 rocket on November 15.
stories.Tweet: Intuitive Machines gear up for the moon 📦 With a key role in NASA's CLPS program, Intuitive Machines aims high with IM-1's lunar lander mission. Set to launch on a Falcon 9 rocket on November 15. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/intuitive-machines-sets-mid-november-launch-date-for-first-lunar-lander/

stories.Title: SK Telecom invests in Anthropic
stories.Description: With a $100 million boost, their partnership explores generative AI, focusing on developing specialized language models for the telecom industry's demands.
stories.Tweet: SK Telecom invests in Anthropic 📦 With a $100 million boost, their partnership explores generative AI, focusing on developing specialized language models for the telecom industry's demands. #anthropic https://www.techtimes.com/articles/295116/20230815/anthropic-receives-100-million-funding-korean-telco-sk-telecom.htm

stories.Title: Google Search gets another AI feature
stories.Description: Users can now enjoy AI-generated summaries of lengthy articles, ensuring quick browsing. Available on iOS and Android, and soon on Chrome.
stories.Tweet: Google Search gets another AI feature 📦 Users can now enjoy AI-generated summaries of lengthy articles, ensuring quick browsing. Available on iOS and Android, and soon on Chrome. #google https://gizmodo.com/google-search-ai-summarize-categorize-articles-1850738940

stories.Title: Humane is ready to unveil everything
stories.Description: The Ai Pin, Humane's groundbreaking wearable, remains a mystery for most of us. However, the startup has selected October 14 to reveal all the insights, coinciding with a solar eclipse.
stories.Tweet: Humane is ready to unveil everything 📦 The Ai Pin, Humane's groundbreaking wearable, remains a mystery for most of us. However, the startup has selected October 14 to reveal all the insights, coinciding with a solar eclipse. #humane https://www.inverse.com/tech/humane-ai-pin-october-14-2023-announcement

stories.Title: Bring fun to your chats!
stories.Description: Android beta testers for WhatsApp have observed the arrival of a new feature. Now, text descriptions can effortlessly transform into personalized stickers with AI.
stories.Tweet: Bring fun to your chats! 📦 Android beta testers for WhatsApp have observed the arrival of a new feature. Now, text descriptions can effortlessly transform into personalized stickers with AI. #whatsapp https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/15/23832635/whatsapp-ai-generated-stickers-test-android-beta

stories.Title: Tesla’s budget-friendly era
stories.Description: Model S and X now offer "Standard Range" versions, a more affordable entry point for electric driving enthusiasts. The battery pack, although similar, features software-locked capacity.
stories.Tweet: Tesla’s budget-friendly era 📦 Model S and X now offer "Standard Range" versions, a more affordable entry point for electric driving enthusiasts. The battery pack, although similar, features software-locked capacity. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/08/14/tesla-launches-model-s-x-with-standard-range/

stories.Title: Expanding the NACS family
stories.Description: Fisker Inc. joins other automakers in selecting Tesla's NACS connector as the charging standard for its electric vehicle lineup, starting in 2025.
stories.Tweet: Expanding the NACS family 📦 Fisker Inc. joins other automakers in selecting Tesla's NACS connector as the charging standard for its electric vehicle lineup, starting in 2025. #EVs https://electrek.co/2023/08/15/fisker-adopt-tesla-nacs-connector/

title: Tesla's affordable solutions, Humane's eclipsing launch date, Introducing: Pibot
description: Tesla’s Model S and Model X are now available in "Standard Range" versions. Maybe the time has come for me to make the purchase. Humane’s Ai Pin is set to become the future's wearable. The startup fuelled anticipation by choosing a solar eclipse as its launch date. And lastly, let's introduce Pibot, a humanoid robot likely to take you on your next vacation.
